Commentary

Africa Reacts to George Floyd’s Death and U.S. Protests Link: /analysis/africa-reacts-george-floyds-death-and-us-protests

June 4, 2020 In the fourth edition of our Africa Reacts series, the CSIS Africa Program features the analysis of prominent African journalists and thought leaders on the murder of George Floyd, ongoing protests, and the administration’s heavy-handed security response.

New Series

On the Horizon

The Covid-19 pandemic will be a history-altering event. But where will it take us? In “On the Horizon,” a new CSIS series, our scholars offer their insights into the fundamental changes we might anticipate for our future social and economic world.

New Series

On the Horizon

Link: https://www.csis.org/programs/horizon

The Covid-19 pandemic will be a history-altering event. But where will it take us? In “On the Horizon,” a new CSIS series, our scholars offer their insights into the fundamental changes we might anticipate for our future social and economic world.

Microsite

Strengthening America’s Health Security

Link: https://healthsecurity.csis.org/

The CSIS Commission on Strengthening America’s Health Security aims to chart a bold vision for the future of U.S. leadership in global health security, at home and abroad.

Microsite

Aerospace Security

Link: https://aerospace.csis.org/

Aerospace Security explores the technological, budgetary, and policy issues related to the air and space domains and innovative operational concepts for air and space forces.
